text: The Seattle Metropolitans were an American professional ice hockey team in the Pacific Coast Hockey Association (PCHL), based in Seattle, Washington from 1915 to 1924. In 1917, The Metropolitans became the first American team to win the Stanley Cup when they defeated the Montreal Canadiens 3 games to 1. They played their home game at the Seattle Ice Arena. ==Other websites== *Metropolitans on seattlehockey.net *Results on hockeydb.com Category:Defunct sports teams Category:Sports in Seattle Category:1915 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Washington (state) Category:1924 disestablishments in the United States Category:20th-century disestablishments in Washington (state) Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States
title: Seattle Metropolitans
